name: KQ2Weather
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: KQ2 – KQTV is your Local Weather Authority. Now you can stay up to date on your latest forecast for the Northwest Missouri and the four-state area. Never let the weather catch you by surprise again. The trusted weather experts at your Local Weather Authority deliver the most accurate hour-by-hour forecast for the next day and for the week ahead.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
